title: Does anyone have any tips on removing wrinkles from the clear plastic ...
body: Movies are our lives! DVD and Blu-ray collectors share pictures of their latest buys and pickups, pictures of their entire collection shelves, we have contests for FREE DVDs, Movie Party nights (watch a movie with 15 strangers), experts give advice and help find the best deals, and more!
readable_content:
- rib_eye_b (2017-09-27): Does anyone have any tips on removing wrinkles from the clear plastic of a blu-ray case? These wrinkles are annoying. Anyone know a trick to smooth things out?
- CaptainGibb (2017-09-27): Honestly just get new cases. Casetopia is a great source. The cases are super cheap so dont be surprised when shipping is a little hefty. Still a great deal
   - zackryderwoos (2017-09-27): How did it get to look like that in the first place?
